title: [BUG] SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor.csproj -  The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 6.0.
body:
```
Build FAILED.

       "K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\source\SkiaSharpSource.Windows-net6.slnf" (Restore target) (1) ->
       "K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\source\SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor\SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor\SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor.csproj" (_GenerateRestoreGraphProjectEntry target) (9:4) ->
       (_CheckForUnsupportedNETCoreVersion target) ->
         C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\5.0.407\Sdks\Microsoft.NET.Sdk\targets\Microsoft.NET.TargetFrameworkInference.targets(141,5): error NETSDK1045: The current .NET SDK does no
       t support targeting .NET 6.0.  Either target .NET 5.0 or lower, or use a version of the .NET SDK that supports .NET 6.0. [K:\AndroidUI-SkiaSharp\source\SkiaSharp.Views.Bl
       azor\SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor\SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor.csproj]

    0 Warning(s)
    1 Error(s)
```
